zh: 贵州省黔南布依族苗族自治州
en: Qianyang County is a county under the jurisdiction of the Qiannan Buyi and Miao Autonomous Prefecture in Guizhou Province.
pinyin: qián yáng xiàn shì guì zhōu shěng qián nán bù yī zú miáo zú zì zhì zhōu xià xiá de yí gè xiàn

en: Qianyang Huangmei Opera Theatre is the only professional Huangmei Opera troupe in Qianxinan Prefecture.
pinyin: qián yáng huáng méi xì jù yuàn shì qián xī nán zhōu wéi yī de yì jiā huáng méi xì zhuān yè jù tuán
